resource: 1002345.1002622.description=Payload is the GVWR minus curb weight and includes weight of occupants, optional equipment and cargo, limited by weight distribution. Payload is not the Vehicle Capacity Weight as defined by FMVSS 110, which will vary according to installed optional equipment. 1910-lb. payload capacity available with 4x2 Regular Cab Long Bed with 5.7L V8 when properly equipped. Calculated with new SAE J2807 method. 1002345.1000851.description=Payload is the GVWR minus curb weight and includes weight of occupants, optional equipment and cargo, limited by weight distribution. Payload is not the Vehicle Capacity Weight as defined by FMVSS 110, which will vary according to installed optional equipment. 20901910-lb. payload capacity available with 4x2 Regular Cab Long Bed with 5.7L V8 when properly equipped. Calculated with new SAE J2807 method. 1002345.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002345.derived=false 1002345.description=Payload is the GVWR minus curb weight and includes weight of occupants, optional equipment and cargo, limited by weight distribution. Payload is not the Vehicle Capacity Weight as defined by FMVSS 110, which will vary according to installed optional equipment. 1910-lb. payload capacity available with 4x2 Regular Cab Long Bed with 5.7L V8 when properly equipped. Calculated with new SAE J2807 method. 1002345.vtc=true
